title: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft Purview | Information Barriers admin experience - Segments and Policies landing pages
description:
The Information Barriers solution within the Microsoft Purview compliance portal enables organizations to restrict communication and collaboration between two user groups to avoid a conflict of interest from occurring. This user experience (UX) update adds solution landing pages within the Microsoft Purview compliance portal for management of Information Barriers segments and policies.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/information-barriers-policies?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: April CY2022
